item.title: Primers Details
item.description:
Primers Details

Click Show primers details to view statistical details about primers.

The following dialog will appear:

This dialog provides statistical details about primers, such as melting temperature, GC content, dimers, self-dimers, etc. If a value does not meet its criteria, it is highlighted in red.

item.title: Primer Library
item.description:
Primer Library

The primer library serves as storage for user-defined primers. The primers you add are preserved between UGENE sessions.

To configure the primer library, navigate to the Tools->Primer->Primer library context menu. The following window will appear:

Click the New primer button to add a new primer. The following dialog will appear:

Input the primer sequence and primer name, then click the OK button.

Select the primer and click the Edit primer button to edit the primer.
